title: Awesome List Updates on Jan 08, 2021

items.title: Webcomponents the Right Way
items.content_html:
Styling

  • Options for styling web components

items.title: Awesome Earth
items.content_text:
### Politics

*   [Climate Reality](https://climaterealityproject.org) - an initiative of former United States vice president and 2007 Nobel Peace Prize laureate Al Gore to make urgent action a necessity to address climate change issues through activism and cutting greenhouse gas emissions.

### YouTube Channels

*   [Climate Town](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuVLG9pThvBABcYCm7pkNkA) - Rollie Williams and a ragtag team of climate communicators, creatives and comedians are here to examine climate change in a way that doesn’t make you want to eat a cyanide pill.
*   [ClimateAdam](https://www.youtube.com/user/ClimateAdam) - Doctor in climate science from Oxford. Trying to make sense of climate change with fun YouTube vids.
*   [Hot Mess](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsaEBhRsI6tmmz12fkSEYdw) - A show about how climate change impacts all of us, and about how we can create a better future for our planet and ourselves. Hosted by Miriam Nielsen, Talia Buford, and Joe Hanson.
*   [Our Changing Climate](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNXvxXpDJXp-mZu3pFMzYHQ) - A bi-weekly video essay series that investigates humanity's relationship to the natural world.
*   [Simon Clark](https://www.youtube.com/user/SimonOxfPhys) - PhD in climate physics by day, YouTuber by night. He makes videos about both!
items.content_html:
Politics

  • Climate Reality - an initiative of former United States vice president and 2007 Nobel Peace Prize laureate Al Gore to make urgent action a necessity to address climate change issues through activism and cutting greenhouse gas emissions.

YouTube Channels

  • Climate Town - Rollie Williams and a ragtag team of climate communicators, creatives and comedians are here to examine climate change in a way that doesn’t make you want to eat a cyanide pill.
  • ClimateAdam - Doctor in climate science from Oxford. Trying to make sense of climate change with fun YouTube vids.
  • Hot Mess - A show about how climate change impacts all of us, and about how we can create a better future for our planet and ourselves. Hosted by Miriam Nielsen, Talia Buford, and Joe Hanson.
  • Our Changing Climate - A bi-weekly video essay series that investigates humanity's relationship to the natural world.
  • Simon Clark - PhD in climate physics by day, YouTuber by night. He makes videos about both!

items.title: Awesome Math
items.content_text:
### Mathematical Physics / Stochastic processes

*   [Evan Chen](https://web.evanchen.cc/coursework.html) - MIT. 2012 \~ 2018. Covers Combinatorics, Number Theory, Honors Algebra, Set Theory, Real Analysis, Graph Theory, and more.
*   [Dexter Chua](https://dec41.user.srcf.net/notes/) - Harvard. 2013 \~ 2018. Covers Analysis, Probability, Linear Algebra, Complex Analysis, Numerical Analysis, Statistics, Optimization, Algebraic Topology, Quantum Field Theory, and more.
items.content_html:
Mathematical Physics / Stochastic processes

  • Evan Chen - MIT. 2012 ~ 2018. Covers Combinatorics, Number Theory, Honors Algebra, Set Theory, Real Analysis, Graph Theory, and more.
  • Dexter Chua - Harvard. 2013 ~ 2018. Covers Analysis, Probability, Linear Algebra, Complex Analysis, Numerical Analysis, Statistics, Optimization, Algebraic Topology, Quantum Field Theory, and more.

items.title: Awesome Perl
items.content_text:
### Cryptography / DSP

*   [Bitcoin::Crypto](https://metacpan.org/pod/Bitcoin::Crypto) - Bitcoin cryptography in Perl
*   [CryptX](https://metacpan.org/pod/CryptX) - Cryptographic toolkit

### Form Frameworks / NoSQL Databases

*   [Form::Tiny](https://metacpan.org/pod/Form::Tiny) - Forms reusing Type::Tiny type constraints.

### Type checking / Coverage

*   [MooseX::Types](https://metacpan.org/pod/MooseX::Types) - Moose types management tool
*   [Type::Tiny](https://metacpan.org/pod/Type::Tiny) - Tiny, yet comprehensive type library
items.content_html:
Cryptography / DSP

  • Bitcoin::Crypto - Bitcoin cryptography in Perl
  • CryptX - Cryptographic toolkit

Form Frameworks / NoSQL Databases

  • Form::Tiny - Forms reusing Type::Tiny type constraints.

Type checking / Coverage

  • MooseX::Types - Moose types management tool
  • Type::Tiny - Tiny, yet comprehensive type library

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Solid / Integrations

*   [vite-plugin-solid (⭐480)](https://github.com/amoutonbrady/vite-plugin-solid) - Provides JSX transformation for Solid.

### Rollup Plugins / Included in Vite

*   [@rollup/plugin-alias (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/rollup/plugins/blob/master/packages/alias) - Define and resolve aliases for bundle dependencies.
*   [@rollup/plugin-commonjs (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/rollup/plugins/blob/master/packages/commonjs) - Convert CommonJS modules to ES6.
*   [@rollup/plugin-dynamic-import-vars (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/rollup/plugins/blob/master/packages/dynamic-import-vars) - Resolving dynamic imports that contain variables.
*   [@rollup/plugin-json (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/rollup/plugins/blob/master/packages/json) - Convert `.json` files to ES6 modules.

### Rollup Plugins / Compatible with Vite

*   [@rollup/plugin-dsv (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/rollup/plugins/blob/master/packages/dsv) - Convert `.csv` and `.tsv` files into JavaScript modules with d3-dsv.
*   [@rollup/plugin-graphql (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/rollup/plugins/blob/master/packages/graphql) - Convert .gql/.graphql files to ES6 modules.
*   [@rollup/plugin-replace (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/rollup/plugins/tree/master/packages/replace) - Replace strings in files while bundling.
items.content_html:
Solid / Integrations

  • vite-plugin-solid (⭐480) - Provides JSX transformation for Solid.

Rollup Plugins / Included in Vite

  • @rollup/plugin-alias (⭐3.7k) - Define and resolve aliases for bundle dependencies.
  • @rollup/plugin-commonjs (⭐3.7k) - Convert CommonJS modules to ES6.
  • @rollup/plugin-dynamic-import-vars (⭐3.7k) - Resolving dynamic imports that contain variables.
  • @rollup/plugin-json (⭐3.7k) - Convert .json files to ES6 modules.

Rollup Plugins / Compatible with Vite

  • @rollup/plugin-dsv (⭐3.7k) - Convert .csv and .tsv files into JavaScript modules with d3-dsv.
  • @rollup/plugin-graphql (⭐3.7k) - Convert .gql/.graphql files to ES6 modules.
  • @rollup/plugin-replace (⭐3.7k) - Replace strings in files while bundling.
